price: 44. »¡Padre mío!, no adores al Demonio, pues él es, ciertamente, un rebelde que ha desobedecido al Clemente.
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāabati lā taʿbudi al-shayṭāna inna al-shayṭāna kāna lilrraḥmāni ʿaṣiyyan
